sameAnalysis.word_list: always, often, usually, frequently, repeatedly, regularly
means: always ：总是，永远。语气最强，指在一切时候，没有例外。
often ：经常，语气弱于always,侧重动作发生的次数具有经常性，具体时间意味不强。
usually ：通常，通例地，指习惯性动作，频度仅次于always，较often大，偶尔有间隔。
frequently ：时常，经常，与often同义，可通用，但较正式，强调次数频繁。
repeatedly ：屡次，强调次数多，但反复的频率不一定均匀。
regularly ：用于修饰经常而有规律性的动作。

sentence.Network_en: The reality of mothering is frequently very different from the romantic ideal.
sentence.Network_cn: 养育孩子的现实经常与浪漫的理想大相径庭。

sentence.Network_en: Many of these killers are frequently glib and superficially charming.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些杀手中，多数都是能说会道、外表迷人。

sentence.Network_en: Dry hair can be damaged by washing it too frequently.
sentence.Network_cn: 干性头发洗得太频繁容易受损。

entry.def: If something is frequent, it happens often.

example.ex: Bordeaux is on the main Paris-Madrid line so there are frequent trains...
example.tran: 波尔多位于巴黎到马德里的铁路主干线上，来往列车频繁。

example.ex: He is a frequent visitor to the house.

entry.def: If someone frequents a particular place, they regularly go there.

example.ex: I hear he frequents the Cajun restaurant in Hampstead.
example.tran: 我听说他经常光顾汉普斯特德的卡津餐厅。

sentences.sentence: "we often met over a cup of coffee"

Sentence.sentence: The most frequently shared items are those expensive to buy but not fully used.
Inefficient harvesting, inadequate local transportation and poor infrastructure (基础设施)mean that produce is frequently handled inappropriately and stored under unsuitable farm site conditions.

Of the produce that does appear in the supermarket, commonly used sales promotions frequently encourage customers to purchase excessive quantities which, in the case of perishable foodstuffs, inevitably generate wastage in the home
He frequently gets things mixed up.

sentences.en: an accusation frequently levelled at junior doctors
sentences.cn: 经常针对实习医生的指责

sentences.en: At one time we met frequently.

sentences.cn: 布鲁尔和布劳德经常发生冲突。
